sentences.english: Jack whirled to find a heavy-set man facing him.
sentences.chinese: 傑克飛快地轉過身，發現一個體格魁偉的男人。

sentences.english: The decorated archway of village ZhouZhuang seems to stand at the entrance of the attraction as well as my mind.
sentences.chinese: 那周莊的牌樓似乎也很魁偉地立在入口處。

sentences.english: The prince is tall and stalwart.
Mr Darcy soon drew the attention of the room by his fine, tall person.
sentences.chinese: 達西卻立刻引起了全場的注意，因爲他身材魁偉。

sentences.english: The burly man standing next to her also had tears in his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 站在她身邊那個魁偉的男人眼裏也含着淚。

sentences.english: Tom is a mountain of flesh.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆是個身材魁偉的人。

sentences.english: He wondered if the hefty lovers had returned .
sentences.chinese: 他納悶是否是那對魁偉的情人又回來了。

sentences.english: I was aware only of a tall and upright figure.
sentences.chinese: 我只感到面前是一個魁偉筆挺的身影。
